price: 40. Kaadu diggah Nabii Suleymaan Ni-xaqul xayna leeh, meqe gacsimeyna-le akeeral.
arabic: وَإِنَّ لَهُۥ عِندَنَا لَزُلۡفَىٰ وَحُسۡنَ مَـَٔابٖ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: wa-inna lahu ʿindanā lazul'fā waḥus'na maābin
